newsitem.title: BELGIUM: Publication of Belgian car reg stats to be resumed.
newsitem.headline: Publication of Belgian car reg stats to be resumed.

text.p: FEBIAC, the Belgian car manufacturers association, said on Tuesday it reached an agreement with the Belgian state, which would allow it to resume the publication of car registration figures.
Citing a breach of data protection rules, a Belgian court in August banned the association from publishing data based on official monthly figures.
Under the agreement the state will now supply FEBIAC with statistics in a way which makes identification of individuals impossible. FEBIAC said the court had approved the agreement.
